titleCollection: New South Wales, Australia, Convict Registers of Conditional and Absolute Pardons, 1788-1870

sourceDescription: This data collection contains registers of conditional and absolute pardons granted to convicts between 1788 and 1867. The registers recorded information about the convict such as: name, ship and date of arrival, trial date and place, conviction date and place, pardon date, offence, and physical description. Learn more...
